document_data.name: Wink and Kiss
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wink and Kiss''', or '''the Wink and the Kiss''', was a tavern and festhall in [[Yartar]] that fell under the protection of the [[Hand of Yartar]]. It attracted those individuals who were supportive of and often benefited from the criminal organization.
document_data.Location: It was located just east of the [[Fishyard]], Yartar's open-air marketplace.

Structure.Atmosphere:
The festhall was a bawdy and fun establishment that didn't take itself too seriously. It was a great place for those who wanted to find easy-going friends for the evening.

Due to its distinguished patrons however, the Wink and Kiss was declared a safe haven for anyone who entered. Weapons were checked at the door and rowdy behavior was not tolerated.

document_data.History: As of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], it was run by two brothers, [[Asklar]] and [[Beldorm]].
document_data.Notable Customers: * [[Nareen Dhest]], a thief of the Hand that stole a ''[[devastation orb]]'' from the [[Cult of the Eternal Flame]]
